definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Heaven and hell exist here and now, within your own mind.
sentences.chinese: 天堂和地獄此時此地存在你的思想裏。

sentences.english: Noticing new things puts you emphatically in the here and now.
sentences.chinese: 觀察新事物使你着重於此時此地。

sentences.english: It is here, in this quiet moment, that you have an epiphany.
sentences.chinese: 就是在此時此地，你感受到了靈光頓悟。
此時此地，點燈的人是我。

sentences.english: How does it guide our actions here and now?
sentences.chinese: 它如何指引我們在此時此地發生的行爲？
